name: Emercury Extension For Contact Form 7
author: Emercury

sections.description:
Join the 10,000+ customers who use Emercury, an email marketing platform made for lead generators. With this official Emercury for Contact Form 7 WordPress plugin , you can quickly and easily grow your email list by:
Embedding great-looking Emercury for Contact Form 7 sign up forms on your WordPress site.
Automatically adding visitors who fill out a Contact Form 7 sign up form on your WordPress site to your Emercury account.
Here are a few of the ways this plugin can help you easily build and manage your email list and accelerate the growth of your business:
KEY FEATURES:
FREE!
Easy to use
Support for 30 custom fields
Unlimited contact forms
Use a different Emercury API key per contact form
Use a different Emercury mailing list per contact form
Latest Emercury API
Constantly updated
Automatically add new subscribers from your Contact Form 7 sign up form to Emercury. Then, continue to engage and connect with your WP visitors by targeting specific segments of your audience based on their interests and traits, as well as the actions they take inside your emails or on your website using Emercury.
You don’t have to be technically savvy to use this plugin.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
2. Activate the plugin.
3. Install and activate Contact form 7 plugin if you haven’t already done so.
4. Go to Contact ->Contact forms ->Emercury and fill in your Emercury email and API key, click Connect button. You can’t use Emercury extensions without Emercury API key. Upon success, Emercury lists will be fetched and you’ll see “API key enabled” notification. Otherwise an “API Key disabled” message is shown.
5. Select a list (already created in Emercury). Then map the data that should be sent from Contact Form 7 Fields to Emercury Fields.
Congratulations, you have successfully configured Emercury Extension For Contact Form 7.

short_description: Immediately add your leads and subscribers directly to Emercury seamlessly with this plugin.
